item.title: Manually generating LetsEncrypt certificate
item.description: In cases where you don't want to disrupt current production server, this is a good approach 1mkdir /opt/letsencrypt 2cd /opt/letsencrypt 3wget https://dl.eff.org/certbot-auto 4chmod a+x certbot-auto 5sudo ./certbot-auto --apache certonly Sample run as follows: 1[root@687elmp01 letsencrypt]# sudo ./certbot-auto --apache certonly 2Saving debug log to /var/log/letsencrypt/letsencrypt.log 3Plugins selected: Authenticator apache, Installer apache 4Enter email address (used for urgent renewal and security notices) (Enter 'c' to 5cancel): me@example.com 67------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 8Please read the Terms of Service at 9https://letsencrypt.
